home.title: AI Research Assistant for Computer Scientists

topics.aiAgriculture: How is AI used in agriculture?

whatIsInsightHub.title: What is Insight Hub
whatIsInsightHub.name: Insight Hub
whatIsInsightHub.description: is a new AI research assistant that helps answer questions about computer science research.

differences.title: How is it different than ChatGPT?
differences.point1: We're hyper-focused on computer science research, ensuring answers are grounded in computer science and don't mix in research from other fields.
differences.point2: We factor in citations (via Semantic Scholar) and social metrics (from X, HackerNews, YouTube, and GitHub) to identify trending new papers that haven't been cited yet.
differences.point3: We provide references so you know what papers Insight Hub is using to answer your question.
differences.point4: We're always up-to-date with the latest papers on arXiv.
differences.point5: We encourage exploration using automatically-generated follow-up questions and embedded topic links.

questionTypes.title: What type of questions can Insight Hub answer?
questionTypes.description: For this beta version of Insight Hub, it uses a combination of abstracts and paper summaries to try to answer questions. For this reason, it excels at answering high-level questions like the examples above. We are working on getting full papers into the system to help answer more complex questions.

suggestions.title: How can I make suggestions?
suggestions.description: We'd love any feedback you have, especially with respect to improving the quality of the answers.
suggestions.contact: Drop us a note anytime at

cost.title: How much does it cost?
cost.description: You can sign up for an account to perform 5 searches/day for free. To perform unlimited searches, you can upgrade to our Pro plan for just $12/month.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay updated with the latest AI research and insights
newsletter.loginRequired: Please log in to subscribe to newsletter

comments.title: Our Insights
comments.description: Learn how to grow your business with our expert advice.

aiResearch.title: The Future of AI Research
aiResearch.description: Exploring the latest breakthroughs in artificial intelligence and their potential impact on scientific research. From neural networks to machine learning algorithms, discover how AI is transforming the research landscape.

machinelearning.title: Machine Learning Best Practices
machinelearning.description: A comprehensive guide to implementing machine learning solutions in real-world applications. Learn about data preprocessing, model selection, and deployment strategies that deliver results.

dataanalysis.title: Advanced Data Analysis Techniques
dataanalysis.description: Dive deep into modern data analysis methodologies and tools. From statistical modeling to visualization techniques, master the art of extracting meaningful insights from complex datasets.
